That zapping bastard!"},{"lineNumber":56870,"originalJapaneseLine":"回復魔法を掛けられ、","translatedEnglishLine":"With healing magic cast,"}]}

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: ...How pathetic.
Ugh...!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: だが、既にレイは間合いを詰めており、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: But already Rei had closed the distance,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: うっすらと冷めた瞳でランスを見下ろしていた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and was looking down at Rance with faintly cold eyes.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「さっさと殺して……次にいくか」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Just finish him quickly... then move on to the next."
(No good, this is bad, my dear friend...!
If this continues like this...)
(Ah, ah, shut up...!
D-damn, if it comes to this...!)
"Ugh... it, it hurts, it hurts...!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 突然、ランスは腹を抱えて苦しみだした。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Suddenly, Rance clutching his stomach began to suffer.
"M-my stomach...!"
Damn, as I thought, it's diarrhea...!
"...Master Rance?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ぐぬ、く、くそおおっ……本調子であれば……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Grr, d-damn it... If I were at full strength..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あーくそ、体調不良のまま戦わざるを得ないとはー」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ah, damn, I have to fight while feeling this bad..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「カオス、お前もなんか調子悪いって言ってただろ、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Chaos, you said you weren't feeling well too, right?"
Huh!?
"Ah! Y-yeah... that's right..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: くくく、ランスには見抜かれてしまったかー。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Heh heh, Rance has seen through me after all.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ほとんどボロボロの、この儂の状態をー」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: My state is practically in tatters—

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「儂と心の友の本気なら、ガイよりも強いのに……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If my dear friend and I were at full power, we'd be stronger than Guy...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ああ、この完全とはほど遠い、身体が憎い……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ah, I despise this body that’s far from perfect...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ほんの僅か、レイの視線は探るようになり……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: For just a moment, Rei's gaze grew probing...
"...Boring.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 完調じゃねェなら戦いに出てくるな」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If you're not at full strength, don't come out to fight."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: すっ、と身に纏う電撃がしぼんでいく。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The electric sparks surrounding him slowly faded away.
"Then I'll let you go today.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 全力出せるようになってからやり直しだ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Come back and retry when you can give your all."
"Hmph, huhu... Is that alright?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 今しか、俺を倒す機会はないぞ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: This is your only chance to defeat me now.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 本調子になったらギッタギタだぞ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: When I'm at full strength, you'll be torn to pieces."
"That's something to look forward to."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 言い捨てて、レイは踵を返した。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Leaving those words behind, Rei turned on his heel.
"...Hmph. Your tricks are on par with that bastard Guy's.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ガイの野郎とどっこいか」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Just like that Guy."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「よ、よ、よろしいのですか、レイ様……！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "A-are you sure about that, Lord Rei...!
Th-that kind of..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「いいンだよ。マジでもガセでも、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "It's fine. Whether it's for real or a bluff,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 今殺したってつまらねェままだ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: killing him now would still be boring."
"B-but..."
Gyaaah!?
"Let's go home."
M Land—

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「くっそー！　あのビリビリ野郎が！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Damn it! That zapping bastard!
With healing magic cast,

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English
